comment.author: 20560070@N05
comment._content: Unfortunately, many have forgotten and still countless others have never known how Ms. Jane Fonda betrayed not only the idea of our country, but specific men who served and sacrificed during Vietnam . NEVER FORGET A TRAITOR www.snopes.com/military/fonda.asp

comment.author: 10608783@N04
comment._content: Including the Snopes URL is a tactic used by right-wing extremists in this case and in many, many others, to make it appear that Snopes attests to the veracity of the claim that Jane Fonda betrayed "specific men who served and sacrificed." This is a damnable LIE and I would guess, although I cannot prove it, that the person who posted this knows that.  Where can one find the truth?  Right at the Snopes page cited.  The hate mongers desperately hope you don't actually go to this page and READ what it says.  I hope you will.
